about_the_game:
Forge your path to glory and liberty in this gladiator rogue-like, where the pursuit of victory echoes with the thunderous applause of gods and men alike.

Ascend to opulent heights and carve your legend through the crucible of combat within the arena's hallowed grounds, where wealth and renown await those brave enough to seize them.

To sculpt a warrior uniquely attuned to your indomitable spirit and strategic prowess, combine gear from four distinct categories and channel your experience into six sacred character attributes

Confront the reigning champion of the arena to reclaim your liberty and shape a legacy destined to echo through the ages.

With each demise of your valiant gladiator, a new hero rises from the ashes, ready to embark on their journey from the depths of the leaderboard, ascending towards immortal glory.

Key Features

  • 4 Different equipment types to combine, creating a unique gladiator every run
  • 6 Character statistics to upgrade, supporting the playstyle you desire
  • The Glorious Arena with a newly generated layout every fight
  • A leaderboard full of procedural opponents
